metadata.title: CVE-2022-43516 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: A Firewall Rule which allows all incoming TCP connections to all programsfrom any source and to all ports is created in Windows Firewall afterZabbix agent installation (MSI)

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
